title: Dear everyone bitching about being stuck in bronze because of team mates. fuck you

embed.description: Come Play LoL with me! http://awe.sm/t3Hut DONATE! http://bit.ly/15loJlH Like me on Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/Gbay99 Follow me on Twitter - http://twitter.com/Gbay99 Streaming at - http://twitch.tv/Gbay99 Day[9]'s 100th Daily: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NJztfsXKcPQ Scarra Interview: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_i5676n11NA Watch this if you feel like or believe that you're stuck in "ELO Hell"

body:
seriously stfu so many posts everyday with the same fucking content

"i always win my lane and come out 20-30 cs ahead but i always get this feeding bot and mid that always go 0-10 in lane, why are all these fuckers ruining my games i should be in AT LEAST plat right now but im stuck in bronze 3 elo hell"

fuck up you're bad

replies.body: you've placed since season 3 and only silver lol

Its your choice to read those posts, not anyone else's.
Yes your correct ELO HELL doesn't exist from a team point of view but it does exist from an individual point of view.

ELO HELL can be anywhere on the ladder, its simply when you don't know how to progress, and get stuck and frustrated.
ultimately its the players problem to resolve this by learning, adapting and realising their faults / issues if he/she wants to continue to move up in the ladder.


Now you seem to be quite confident in your self and your play making abilities, you have quite a high win streak, maybe use that in a positive way when you see these posts and offer some advice?

Will it pay off? is it worth your time?

I think so
